common_params: [{"name":"partner_id","type":"int","sample":"1","description":"Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests."},{"name":"timestamp","type":"timestamp","sample":"1610000000","description":"This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes."},{"name":"access_token","type":"string","sample":"c09222e3fc40ffb25fc947f738b1abf1","description":"The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours."},{"name":"shop_id","type":"int","sample":"600000","description":"Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs."},{"name":"sign","type":"string","sample":"e318d3e932719916a9f9ebb57e2011961bd47abfa54a36e040d050d8931596e2","description":"Signature generated by partner_id, api path, timestamp, access_token, shop_id and partner_key via HMAC-SHA256 hashing algorithm. More details: https://open.shopee.com/documents?module=87&type=2&id=58&version=2"}]
define: Create a new campaign with custom product & affiliate selections, and basic info filling.

error_list.name: error_param
error_list.description: Affiliate is not eligible to promote for AMS campaigns at the moment.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: Budget setup is not supported for your shop.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: The campaign name is a duplicate.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: The minimum commission rate limit was not passed.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: The minimum daily budget requirement was not met.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: Sorry you don't have access to AMS features.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: Please agree to the AMS T&C in Seller Center - Affiliate Marketing Solutions first before using Open API.

error_list.name: error_business
error_list.description: The seller commission operation is frozen.

params:
{"request_params":[{"description":"

The name of the current campaign.

","name":"campaign_name","sample":"CAMPAIGN_NAME","type":"string","required":"True","key":"etmJneK"},{"description":"

The period start time of campaign, in seconds.

","name":"period_start_time","sample":"1735660800","type":"timestamp","required":"True","key":"CtinkM"},{"description":"

The period end time of campaign, in seconds.

Can set 32503651199 (2999-12-31 23:59:59) represent of no limit.

","name":"period_end_time","sample":"32503651199","type":"timestamp","required":"True","key":"PfbZsGw"},{"description":"

Budget allocation toggle for the current campaign.


Note: TH not supported

","name":"is_set_budget","sample":"true","type":"boolean","required":"False","key":"cwyKBjE"},{"description":"

Budget value set for the current campaign.


Note: TH not supported

","name":"budget","sample":"500000.0","type":"float","required":"False","key":"yTQBdmE"},{"description":"

The message displayed to affiliates.

","name":"seller_message","sample":"Hello, pleasant cooperation.","type":"string","required":"True","key":"ZfhEPpH"},{"description":"

The list of items associated with the current campaign.

","name":"item_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":"True","key":"MRxjeES","children":[{"description":"

Item ID.

","name":"item_id","sample":"101","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"pBYWKac"},{"description":"

Commission rate of current item, 1.1 means 1.1%, support two decimal places.

","name":"rate","sample":"1.1","type":"float","required":"True","key":"ZMBJeNi"}]},{"description":"

The list of affiliates associated with the current campaign.

","name":"affiliate_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":"True","key":"BdxtmdS","children":[{"description":"

The unique key for affiliate.

","name":"affiliate_id","sample":"11301234567","type":"int64","required":"True","key":"ekWCBdF"}]}],"response_params":[{"description":"

Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"error","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"GacWEC"},{"description":"

Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

","name":"message","sample":"","type":"string","required":null,"key":"tppDZFw"},{"name":"request_id","type":"string","sample":"b937c04e554847789cbf3fe33a0ad5f1","description":"

The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

","key":"kZQYQbY"},{"description":"

Successful elements will not be returned. 

If error and message are not empty, it means that all settings have failed. 

If error and message are empty, but fail_xx_list has content, it means that the element in the fail_xx_list setting failed and the rest were successful.

If error, message, fail_xx_list are all empty, it means that all settings are successful.

","name":"response","sample":"","type":"object","required":null,"key":"bpJAKmp","children":[{"description":"

The unique key for campaign.

","name":"campaign_id","sample":"101","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"TjxYtYx"},{"description":"

Failed Item List.

","name":"fail_item_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"AZtJyTM","children":[{"description":"

Item ID.

","name":"item_id","sample":"101","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"NENsEXR"},{"description":"

Fail error.

","name":"fail_error","sample":"test_error","type":"string","required":null,"key":"bjXDBXR"},{"description":"

Fail message.

","name":"fail_message","sample":"test_message","type":"string","required":null,"key":"EpdikDA"}]},{"description":"

Fail Affiliate List.

","name":"fail_affiliate_list","sample":"","type":"object[]","required":null,"key":"JYCsCQH","children":[{"description":"

Affiliate ID.

","name":"affiliate_id","sample":"11301234567","type":"int64","required":null,"key":"tGGzrHE"},{"description":"

Fail error.

","name":"fail_error","sample":"test_error","type":"string","required":null,"key":"fbMkCDh"},{"description":"

Fail message.

","name":"fail_message","sample":"test_message","type":"string","required":null,"key":"dmSZeCP"}]}]}]}
